title: Hey
body:
...

[[You want a pizza?|youwantapizza]]
[[That's an old camera|oldcamera]]

title: youwantapizza
body:
Ah pizza... How is it that a dish, morseled by the Romans in its most primitive from and then perfected in the vicolos and cucinas of Naples in 18th century - a dish draped proudly in the hues of the tricolore - can be so American?

[[Preach mate]]

title: Preach mate
body:
Pineapples
Bacon
Chicken
BBQ Sauce

This is the world we made.

[[Gross]]

title: Gross
body:
Authentic, real pizza. That's what I want.

At least Jamie could make a good marinara.

title: Yes
body:
I am afraid of fear.

[[You want a pizza?|youwantapizza]]

title: oldcamera
body:
Still works fine.

[[What are you photographing?|whatareyouphotographing]]

title: whatareyouphotographing
body:
Signs and images, mostly.

[[How do you mean?|howdoyoumean]]

title: howdoyoumean
body:
I had an assignment. Follow the road, document what I saw. I think I'm finished.

[[How was the trip?|howwasthetrip]]

title: howwasthetrip
body:
Horrible

Soon as you leave New York,
nothing changes any more.
Everything looks the same.
You can't think any more,
especially the thought
that things could ever change.

[[You want a pizza?|youwantapizza]]
